text: Yes, <http://drafter.ai|drafter.ai> provides custom solutions based on use case. What are you looking for and I'll point you in the right place?
Are you talking about GDPR deletion requests originating from the customer/prospect, or other?

If you want it done more manually there are other solutions as well.

What do you want it to go into?
I'd simply put the info you can disclose, and if you have a free trial simply put the trial period and "free to try for xyz days"
It's to get the installs, downloads, and reviews and to appear higher in results
This is a common tactic with APAC marketing that often even involves X number of free products given in exchange for reviews, or sold at discount with a rebate of the entire value
If you want it to go into postgres definitely definitely use <http://sequin.io|sequin.io>
Best sync tool for HubSpot (stripe and airtable as well)
